content: I like some of the suggestions, especially Codenames since I've already had a great experience with it. Speaking of new games, I recently tried Azul at a board game cafe and loved it. My sister and I also started a monthly game challenge where we take turns choosing a game to play and learn together. Last month, she chose Settlers of Catan, which I'd never played before, and I really enjoyed it. Do you have any other strategic games like those that you'd recommend?
